mapper.insert: insert into member(USER_ID, USER_PASS, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_ADDRESS_POST, USER_ADDRESS, USER_PHONE, USER_FILE, USER_IMG, USER_CHECK) values (#{USER_ID},#{USER_PASS},#{USER_NAME}, #{USER_NICKNAME},#{USER_EMAIL},#{USER_ADDRESS_POST},#{USER_ADDRESS}, #{USER_PHONE}, #{USER_FILE, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{USER_IMG, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0')
mapper.update: update member set USER_NAME = #{USER_NAME}, USER_NICKNAME = #{USER_NICKNAME} , USER_EMAIL = #{USER_EMAIL} , USER_ADDRESS_POST = #{USER_ADDRESS_POST}, USER_ADDRESS =#{USER_ADDRESS}, USER_PHONE = #{USER_PHONE}, USER_FILE = #{USER_FILE}, USER_IMG = #{USER_IMG} where USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where USER_ID != 'admin'
